attributes.action: Please help to stop this nuisance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sir,
Could I please ask the people of the UK to make their vote on this issue and send it to you.
I am heartily sick of salespeople in supermarkets trying to make me change gas, electric or phone providers. They will not take no for an answer and have often left me feeling stressed, upset and angry. They will not take no for an answer and on occasions have tried to follow me out of the store. I go shopping regularly and I do not want to go home feeling harassed. I myself am disabled and cannot do with this pressure. I can't be the only one to feel like this can I?. Maybe a petition will stop them? I really hope so.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
